successes.title: Brydge + iPad: Do more.
successes.description: An anodized aluminum keyboard for your iPad with built-in speakers that connects with a hinge for nearly 180 degrees of positioning.

Pledges.description: Early Adopter Special. As a thank you for being one of the first to support Brydge, you will receive Brydge without speakers for $150
[US Shipping included. Please add $35 for International Shipping. Please add $20 for shipping to Canada.]
You will receive the Brydge, without speakers. [US Shipping included. Please add $35 for International Shipping. Please add $20 for shipping to Canada.]

Early Adopter Special. As a thank you for being one of the first to support Brydge you will receive Brydge with speakers for $180 [US Shipping included. Please add $35 for International Shipping. Please add $20 for shipping to Canada.]
You will receive the Brydge, with speakers. [US Shipping included. Please add $35 for International Shipping. Please add $20 for shipping to Canada.]

Limited Edition Model. For this pledge you will receive one of the first Brydges with speakers produced , laser engraved with the your model number. Your number will match the order in which pledge. Example: The first backer will receive model #1, etc... [US Shipping included. Please add $35 for International Shipping. Please add $20 for shipping to Canada.]
Ultra Special Limited Edition Brydge with speakers. Just for fun we're going to make ten Brydge anodized in San Francisco Gold, laser etched with your name. [Shipping included]

RETAIL STARTER KIT - You will receive 10 Brydges in full retail packaging 20% off the Kickstarter price (which is already lower than the final retail price will be) - 5 with speakers and 5 without speakers. [Freight shipping to be paid for by the backer, based on location]

RETAIL KIT - You will receive 50 Brydges in full retail packaging 30% off the Kickstarter price (which is already lower than the final retail price will be) - 25 with speakers and 25 without speakers. [Freight shipping to be paid for by the backer, based on location]
